column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=I think they are spread a little too thin and there is nothing in my book that was not posted on the internet , either under my pseudonym “ Kathryn ” , or in internet posts .
#Text=In addition I was on the stand in court for one of the Lisa McPherson hearings on her death , and they had free opportunity to question me on these matters .
#Text=Towards the end of your book you describe how you still kept in touch with a son who was still actively taking Scientology courses - and that you had friends still working in the organization .
#Text=Have you experienced the Scientology practice of " Disconnection " ?
#Text=Have any of these people been instructed by Scientology to cease communication with you ?
#Text=It is so freeing to now be able to decide who is a friend and who is not – on my own with no other influences .
#Text=— Nancy
#Text=Many
#Text=My son is his own person , and I am proud he makes his own decisions .
#Text=We do n’t discuss it other than the discussion I described in the book .
#Text=Yes I have had people Disconnect from me , and it is sad .
#Text=I used to be a member of this group , so I also disconnected from others .
#Text=It is so freeing to now be able to decide who is a friend and who is not – on my own with no other influences .
#Text=During the recounting in the book of your mental breakdown , you cite your husband and family as key factors in helping and supporting you .
#Text=What else , or who else - what other factors have helped you recover from your mental break after disengaging from Scientology ?
#Text=The other factors that helped were that I did have a lot of friends who were not and had never been Scientologists , so I could hang with them and the subject would never come up .
#Text=Thereby not " triggering " me back to Scientology language or way of life .
#Text=I also have/had a deep faith in God and an internal strength that made me pull my way out of the intermittent hell that lasted for years .
#Text=I knew this was life or death .
#Text=There were simply people or places I could not be around .
#Text=Recently another book by a former member of Scientology 's Sea Org was published , Blown for Good by Marc Headley .
#Text=Have you read other books on Scientology ?
#Text=What other books about the organization ( other than those produced by it ) stand out for you as important in understanding its impact and the internal workings of the movement ?
#Text=I love Marc Headly 's book and feel very strongly that our books are so different that they ( together ) give a vivid and 3 dimensional view of the world of Scientology .
